title: US stocks drop as investors hunt for potential losers from AI
description: U.S. stocks are dropping as the market punishes companies seen as potential losers from artificial-intelligence technology
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — U.S. stocks are dropping Thursday as the market punishes companies seen as potential losers from artificial-intelligence technology.

title: Real Estate Stocks Sink on Worry About AI Risk to Office Demand
description: Commercial real estate stocks nosedived Thursday as traders worried about risk to demand for office space from higher use of artificial intelligence tools, broadening a selloff that began Wednesday in small corner of the market.
content:
Commercial real estate stocks nosedived Thursday as traders worried about risk to demand for office space from higher use of artificial intelligence tools, broadening a selloff that began Wednesday in small corner of the market.

title: Logistics Stocks Sink as AI Fear Trade Finds Latest Victim
description: Logistics stocks sank Thursday as investors rushed to exit the group amid fears over disruption from artificial intelligence, making it the latest casualty of the “AI scare trade.”
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Logistics stocks sank Thursday as investors rushed to exit the group amid fears over disruption from artificial intelligence, making it the latest casualty of the “AI scare trade.”

title: As AI Investors Eye Montana for New Data Centers, Communities Brace for Water Impacts
description: While Montana might not be viewed as an artificial intelligence hotbed, it is considered among the top states in the country with potential to “power the AI revolution.” An analysis CNBC published last July based on grid reliability and average market electricity price named Montana as the No. 3 state in the country for its potential to power data centers. Despite that, only a handful of relatively small data centers have been built in the Treasure State, and several operations have come and gone.
content: While Montana might not be viewed as an artificial intelligence hotbed, it is considered among the top states in the country with potential to “power the AI revolution.” An analysis CNBC published last July based on grid reliability and average marke... [13980 chars]

title: AI restores voice to musician with motor neurone disease, bringing him back to the stage
description: Diagnosed with motor neurone disease at 29, the Bristol-based singer recreated his lost singing voice using artificial intelligence and performed live again in
content:
A musician who lost his ability to sing after being diagnosed with motor neurone disease has returned to the stage with the help of artificial intelligence, in a moment he described as deeply personal and life affirming, the BBC reported.

description: Researchers in Europe have discovered what seems to be an ancient Roman board game stone which dates back 2,000 years after they used artificial intelligence and 3D scanning technology to study its...
content:
Researchers in Europe have discovered what seems to be an ancient Roman board game stone which dates back 2,000 years after they used artificial intelligence and 3D scanning technology to study its markings.

title: CBIC to Roll Out Eligible Manufacturer-Importer Scheme by March 1: Chairman
description: With artificial intelligence and machine learning increasingly being deployed in risk assessment and cargo screening, the new system aims to reduce physical inspections and human intervention, enabling faster, data-driven decision-making.
content: The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) is set to introduce the proposed Eligible Manufacturer-Importer scheme by March 1, with a draft framework to be released in five to six days for stakeholder consultation, a top official said on T... [1596 chars]
